name: Ibrahim
headerTaglineFour: I Develop Front End & Back End Of Web and Mobile Applications  Using Multiple FrameWorks .

projects.title: BurgerEats
projects.description2: An online burger ordering application that closely resembles Burger's Lab ordering platform. This app is designed to provide a similar experience, allowing users to conveniently order their favorite burgers with just a few clicks. Inspired by the functionality and user-friendly interface of Burger's Lab, my application aims to capture the essence of their service while offering a unique twist. Users can explore a wide range of burger options amnd meals

projects.title: ShoeSphere - Shoe Store
projects.description2: A FullStack shoe shop that leverages the dynamic capabilities of Next.js and Node.js, coupled with a MongoDB database. Seamlessly incorporated within this platform is the powerful Stripe payment integration, guaranteeing secure and smooth transactions. An advanced authentication system further enhances user engagement, providing personalized experiences and order tracking.

projects.title: WonderBuy
projects.description2: An innovative e-commerce platform, the FullStack E-Commerce, harnesses the versatility of React.js and Node.js. Backed by a MongoDB database, this dynamic application offers seamless browsing and purchasing experiences. The integration of Stripe ensures secure payments, while an advanced authentication system adds a personalized touch, fostering user engagement and facilitating order tracking.

projects.title: DocCom
projects.description2: Experience a full stack chat application that combines secure authentication, Twilio SMS notifications, direct/group chats, threaded replies, emojis, GIFs, YouTube video embedding, and intuitive search capabilities. This versatile platform redefines communication by seamlessly integrating these features, making conversations more engaging and efficient.

projects.title: TastyBites
projects.description2: A web application tailored for restaurants, empowering seamless online meal ordering. This cutting-edge solution is expertly crafted, with a Firebase backend ensuring robust functionality, while the React frontend employs the Context API for efficient state management. Customers can enjoy a user-friendly interface, effortlessly browsing menu options, placing orders. The synergy between Firebase and React guarantees real-time updates, enhancing order accuracy and delivery efficiency, making this application a pivotal asset for modern restaurants aiming to provide convenient and satisfying dining experiences.

projects.title: Fintrack
projects.description2: An Expense Tracker was developed using Firebase Realtime Database. CRUD operations were implemented using Axios, while form validation was achieved through Formik and Yup. The project also utilized Context API, navigation features, and CRUD operations. Firebase was chosen as the backend for one instance of the project, while the other instance used a Node.js backend with MongoDB as the database. Additionally, a third-party UI library, React Native Paper, was employed.

projects.title: Facebook messenger Clone
projects.description2: Facebook Messenger Clone app, a showcase of my skills in frontend and backend development. Built using cutting-edge technologies, this app mimics the familiar chat interface of Facebook Messenger. From real-time messaging to user authentication, I've implemented features that demonstrate my proficiency in creating interactive and secure applications.

projects.title: FinanceFlow
projects.description2: In this expense tracker project, I've practiced using all React hooks and state management techniques. I've also worked extensively with events, conditional content rendering, components, animations, and form validations. Furthermore, I've implemented the useReducer hook for more complex state management, integrated chart.js for data visualization, and successfully manipulated date objects to enhance the functionality.

projects.title: Vidly Backend
projects.description2: Made a clone of vidly backend site. Developed and maintained the backend infrastructure of the Vidly movie site, including databases, search algorithms, and efficient content management across a diverse array of genres such as action, comedy, drama, horror, romance, and more,route handling, middleware, and error handling in Express.

projects.title: WanderTales
projects.description2: Unveil the perfect companion for preserving your cherished moments with our virtual notebook application. It offers an elegant and intuitive way to organize your favorite places, enabling you to save and categorize them effortlessly. Whether it's comprehensive information, captivating images, exact locations, or personal notes, this application provides a seamless and delightful memory-keeping experience that ensures every detail is captured and relived with ease.

services.title: Mobile App Development
services.description: I can develop your mobile app with high performance and great UI, so you have your business in the palm of your hand

services.title: Web App Development
services.description: I can develop any website application using modern technologies which will grow your business.

services.title: UI/UX Design
services.description: I can design your idea into a web app design or mobile app design so you don't have to spend much time on development.

services.title: 3D Modeling & Animation
services.description: I can design your idea into a web app design or mobile app design so you don't have to spend much time on development.

aboutpara: I am a skilled MERN Stack and iOS/Android applications developer with extensive experience in utilizing cutting-edge technologies, including Next.js, React Native, React, Node.js, MongoDB, Firebase, MySQL, Git/GitHub, Soctek.io, three.js, chart.js, pusher,stream chat, auth0, passport.js, JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS3. My passion drives me to approach every task with enthusiasm, perceiving each challenge as an opportunity for growth and innovation. I possess a deep commitment to excellence, continuously seeking ways to enhance my skills and stay abreast of the latest industry advancements. I look forward to collaborating with you and delivering exceptional results.

resume.tagline: I'm a Full stack software Developer.
resume.description: I have delivered world-class user experiences to millions of people. Well-versed with React, Javascript, and most of the Web frameworks.

experiences.bullets: Worked on the frontend of a React application, Worked on the frontend of a React application
